description: Fortinet products are affected by multiple vulnerabilities that can be exploited by unauthenticated attackers to execute arbitrary code. The vulnerabilities, identified as CVE-2023-36554, CVE-2023-47534, CVE-2023-42789, CVE-2023-42790, CVE-2023-48788, and CVE-2024-23112, range from improper access controls to SQL injection issues which allow execution of malicious commands. The affected systems include FortiClientEMS versions 6.0 through 7.2.2, all FortiOS versions from 6.2 to 7.4.1, and various FortiProxy versions. Successful exploitation can enable attackers to install programs, alter data, or create user accounts with elevated rights. The risk varies depending on the privilege level associated with the exploited account. Prompt application of the provided security updates is critical to mitigate these risks.
